vernac_cmds: Fixpoint listrep (sh: share) (contents: list val) (x: val) : mpred := match contents with | h::hs => EX y:val, data_at sh t_struct_list (h,y) x * listrep sh hs y | nil => !! (x = nullval) && emp end.
Arguments listrep sh contents x : simpl never.
Lemma listrep_local_facts: forall sh contents p, listrep sh contents p |-- !! (is_pointer_or_null p /\ (p=nullval <-> contents=nil)).
revert p; induction contents; unfold listrep; fold listrep; intros; normalize.
Lemma listrep_valid_pointer: forall sh contents p, sepalg.nonidentity sh -> listrep sh contents p |-- valid_pointer p.
destruct contents; unfold listrep; fold listrep; intros; normalize.
Lemma listrep_null: forall sh contents, listrep sh contents nullval = !! (contents=nil) && emp.
destruct contents; unfold listrep; fold listrep.
Lemma is_pointer_or_null_not_null: forall x, is_pointer_or_null x -> x <> nullval -> isptr x.

Definition append_spec := DECLARE _append WITH sh : share, x: val, y: val, s1: list val, s2: list val PRE [ _x OF (tptr t_struct_list) , _y OF (tptr t_struct_list)] PROP(writable_share sh) LOCAL (temp _x x; temp _y y) SEP (listrep sh s1 x; listrep sh s2 y) POST [ tptr t_struct_list ] EX r: val, PROP() LOCAL(temp ret_temp r) SEP (listrep sh (s1++s2) r).
Definition Gprog : funspecs := ltac:(with_library prog [ append_spec ]).
Definition lseg (sh: share) (contents: list val) (x z: val) : mpred := ALL cts2:list val, listrep sh cts2 z -* listrep sh (contents++cts2) x.
Lemma body_append: semax_body Vprog Gprog f_append append_spec.
destruct s1 as [ | v s1']; unfold listrep at 1; fold listrep.

forward_while ( EX a: val, EX s1b: list val, EX t: val, EX u: val, PROP () LOCAL (temp _x x; temp _t t; temp _u u; temp _y y) SEP (listrep sh (a::s1b++s2) t -* listrep sh (s1++s2) x; data_at sh t_struct_list (a,u) t; listrep sh s1b u; listrep sh s2 y))%assert.
destruct s1b; unfold listrep at 3; fold listrep.
unfold listrep; fold listrep; Exists u0; auto.
pull_right (listrep sh (a :: s2) t -* listrep sh (s1 ++ s2) x).
Definition lseg (sh: share) (contents: list val) (x z: val) : mpred := ALL cts2:list val, listrep sh cts2 z -* listrep sh (contents++cts2) x.
Lemma body_append: semax_body Vprog Gprog f_append append_spec.
destruct s1 as [ | v s1']; unfold listrep; fold listrep.

forward_while (EX s1a: list val, EX a: val, EX s1b: list val, EX t: val, EX u: val, PROP (s1 = s1a ++ a :: s1b) LOCAL (temp _x x; temp _t t; temp _u u; temp _y y) SEP (lseg sh s1a x t; data_at sh t_struct_list (a,u) t; listrep sh s1b u; listrep sh s2 y))%assert.
Exists (@nil val) v s1' x u.
destruct s1b; unfold listrep; fold listrep.
extensionality cts; simpl; rewrite app_ass; reflexivity.
unfold listrep at 2; fold listrep; Exists u0.

Fixpoint lseg (sh: share) (contents: list val) (x z: val) : mpred := match contents with | h::hs => !! (x<>z) && EX y:val, data_at sh t_struct_list (h,y) x * lseg sh hs y z | nil => !! (x = z /\ is_pointer_or_null x) && emp end.
Arguments lseg sh contents x z : simpl never.
Lemma lseg_local_facts: forall sh contents p q, lseg sh contents p q |-- !! (is_pointer_or_null p /\ is_pointer_or_null q /\ (p=q <-> contents=nil)).
apply derives_trans with (lseg sh contents p q && !! (is_pointer_or_null p /\ is_pointer_or_null q /\ (p = q <-> contents = []))).
revert p; induction contents; intros; simpl; unfold lseg; fold lseg.
Lemma lseg_valid_pointer: forall sh contents p , sepalg.nonidentity sh -> lseg sh contents p nullval |-- valid_pointer p.
destruct contents; unfold lseg; fold lseg; intros; normalize; auto with valid_pointer.
Lemma lseg_eq: forall sh contents x, lseg sh contents x x = !! (contents=nil /\ is_pointer_or_null x) && emp.
destruct contents; unfold lseg; fold lseg.
Lemma lseg_null: forall sh contents, lseg sh contents nullval nullval = !! (contents=nil) && emp.
Lemma lseg_cons: forall sh (v u x: val) s, readable_share sh -> data_at sh t_struct_list (v, u) x * lseg sh s u nullval |-- lseg sh [v] x u * lseg sh s u nullval.
destruct s; unfold lseg at 1; fold lseg; entailer.
Lemma lseg_cons': forall sh (v u x a b: val) , readable_share sh -> data_at sh t_struct_list (v, u) x * data_at sh t_struct_list (a,b) u |-- lseg sh [v] x u * data_at sh t_struct_list (a,b) u.
Lemma lseg_app': forall sh s1 s2 (a w x y z: val), readable_share sh -> lseg sh s1 w x * lseg sh s2 x y * data_at sh t_struct_list (a,z) y |-- lseg sh (s1++s2) w y * data_at sh t_struct_list (a,z) y.
revert w; induction s1; intro; simpl.
Lemma lseg_app_null: forall sh s1 s2 (w x: val), readable_share sh -> lseg sh s1 w x * lseg sh s2 x nullval |-- lseg sh (s1++s2) w nullval.
revert w; induction s1; intro; simpl.
Lemma lseg_app: forall sh s1 s2 a s3 (w x y z: val), readable_share sh -> lseg sh s1 w x * lseg sh s2 x y * lseg sh (a::s3) y z |-- lseg sh (s1++s2) w y * lseg sh (a::s3) y z.
sep_apply (lseg_app' sh s1 s2 a w x y u); auto.
Lemma listrep_lseg_null : listrep = fun sh s p => lseg sh s p nullval.
unfold lseg, listrep; apply pred_ext; entailer!.
unfold lseg, listrep; fold lseg; fold listrep.
apply pred_ext; Intros y; Exists y; rewrite IHs; entailer!.
Lemma body_append: semax_body Vprog Gprog f_append append_spec.
destruct s1 as [ | v s1']; unfold lseg at 1; fold lseg.

forward_while (EX s1a: list val, EX a: val, EX s1b: list val, EX t: val, EX u: val, PROP (s1 = s1a ++ a :: s1b) LOCAL (temp _x x; temp _t t; temp _u u; temp _y y) SEP (lseg sh s1a x t; data_at sh t_struct_list (a,u) t; lseg sh s1b u nullval; lseg sh s2 y nullval))%assert.
Exists (@nil val) v s1' x u.
destruct s1b; unfold lseg at 2; fold lseg.
sep_apply (lseg_cons' sh a u0 t v0 z); auto.
sep_apply (lseg_app' sh s1a [a] v0 x t u0 z); auto.
sep_apply (lseg_cons sh a y t s2); auto.
sep_apply (lseg_app_null sh [a] s2 t y); auto.
sep_apply (lseg_app_null sh s1a ([a]++s2) x t); auto.

destruct contents; unfold listrep; fold listrep.

destruct s1b; unfold listrep at 3; fold listrep.
unfold listrep; fold listrep; Exists u0; auto.
pull_right (listrep sh (a :: s2) t -* listrep sh (s1 ++ s2) x).

destruct s; unfold lseg at 1; fold lseg; entailer.
revert w; induction s1; intro; simpl.
revert w; induction s1; intro; simpl.
sep_apply (lseg_app' sh s1 s2 a w x y u); auto.
unfold lseg, listrep; apply pred_ext; entailer!.
unfold lseg, listrep; fold lseg; fold listrep.
